channel.title: Code on JacksBlog
channel.description: Recent content in Code on JacksBlog

item.title: Solving WSL2 Installation Failure Caused by 'Invisible' Hyper-V
item.description: Enable hidden Hyper-V with DISM to fix WSL2 install errors. Run AI tools like Codex in Unix CLI for precise edits using sed, awk, diff, and patch.

item.title: HDR Image Formats Explained (III): UltraHDR and MPF
item.description: Identify UltraHDR images by detecting hdrgm:Version=1.0 in the JPEG's XMP metadata, per Google's spec, which includes a primary image and gainmap for HDR rendering.

item.title: HDR Image Format Analysis (II): JPEG and Its Modifications
item.description: Learn JPEG file structure: SOI/EOI markers, metadata, JFIF format. Use a free parser to analyze binary segments (FF D8, FF D9) and compressed data.

item.title: Add a Little Gadget, and Talk About How I Update Articles
item.description: Hugo blog automation: GitHub Actions deployment, draft management, LLM post-processing for multilingual content.

item.title: Changing Domains and Random Thoughts About Personal Blog
item.description: Migrate from jackchou00.icu to jackchou.top for long-term renewal, updating DNS and adding a bilingual guide banner for seamless domain transition.

item.title: How to Completely Remove a File from Git History
item.description: Use git-filter-repo to remove large or sensitive files from Git history. Rewriting changes commit hashesâ€”backup and alert collaborators first.
